# fastp 版本

```{bash}
fastp -v
```

# 執行 fastp

```{bash}
fastp \
  -i ../.test/a.chr21_R1.fastq.gz \
  -I ../.test/a.chr21_R2.fastq.gz \
  -o results/a.chr21_R1.trimmed.fastq.gz \
  -O results/a.chr21_R2.trimmed.fastq.gz \
  --html fastp_report.html \
  --json fastp_report.json \
  --thread 4
```

# fastp 指令

```{bash}
fastp --help
```
